name: Earth
short_info: The third planet from the Sun and the only known celestial body to support life.

name: Mars
short_info: The fourth planet from the Sun often called the "Red Planet."

name: Jupiter
short_info: The largest planet in our solar system known for its massive size and powerful storms.

name: Saturn
short_info: Famous for its stunning ring system Saturn is the sixth planet from the Sun.

name: Neptune
short_info: The eighth and farthest known planet from the Sun known for its deep blue color.

name: Venus
short_info: The second planet from the Sun often referred to as Earths "sister planet."

name: Mercury
short_info: The smallest planet in our solar system closest to the Sun.

name: Uranus
short_info: The seventh planet from the Sun known for its distinct tilt.

name: Pluto
short_info: A dwarf planet located in the Kuiper Belt once considered the ninth planet.

name: Kepler-22b
short_info: An exoplanet located in the habitable zone of the star Kepler-22.

name: Gliese 581g
short_info: A potentially habitable exoplanet orbiting the red dwarf star Gliese 581.

name: Proxima Centauri b
short_info: A potentially habitable exoplanet in the habitable zone of Proxima Centauri.

name: TRAPPIST-1e
short_info: An exoplanet in the TRAPPIST-1 system part of a seven-planet system.
